pages.title: Nature Essence Ritual
pages.text: To begin crafting Coatings, you must first perform the Nature Essence Ritual.$(br)This ritual infuses nature's raw energy into a Water Bucket, enabling further alchemy with the Cauldron.

pages.title: Ritual Ingredients
pages.text: Required Items:$(br)- 1 Hex Focus$(br)- 1 Ritual Brazier$(br)- 1 Water Bucket $(br)- 1 Infused Farmland$(br)- 8 different flowers (any type)$(br)Note: You must offer a variety of flowers, not duplicates!

Insert the Water Bucket into the Brazier.$(br)Place Infushed Farmland 1 block under the Brazier.$(br)Ensure all ingredients are placed correctly.$(br)The Brazier will ignite the ritual when right click with a Hex Focus.

pages.title: The Ritual
pages.text: Surround the Ritual Brazier with 8 different flowers, arranged in a square around the Brazier and place Infused Farmland below the Brazier.

If successful, the Water Bucket will be transformed into a Bucket of Nature Essence and a thunderstorm will occur.$(br)Use the Bucket of Nature Essence to begin coating rituals by pouring it into a Cauldron.
Ready to use Essence Coating Ritual cauldron.
